problem_text: P is the centroid of triangle Q U S. If Q P = 14 centimeters, what is the length of Q T?
compact_text: P is the centroid of triangle QUS. If QP = 14 centimeters, what is the length of QT?
annotat_text: $P$ is the centroid of triangle $QUS$. If $QP=14$ centimeters, what is the length of $\overline{QT}$?
